title: Resolve Minor Security Issues Reported by Horusec

body:
Hey I was trying to pick this up and ran the horusec check on develop. The build issues are not available anymore in the linked CI build, you can check my pastebin here for the list of issues: https://pastebin.com/VqKCYC6A

I tried some dependencies but I'm not familiar with bazel, getting the following error:

```
âžœ  prysm git:(horusec-scanner) âœ— bazelisk run //:gazelle -- update-repos -from_file=go.mod                                          
INFO: Repository llvm_toolchain instantiated at:
  /home/mattia/repos/prysm/WORKSPACE:29:15: in <toplevel>
Repository rule llvm_toolchain defined at:
  /home/mattia/.cache/bazel/_bazel_mattia/d3471c3b3fa4133093f049a701cbc11f/external/com_grail_bazel_toolchain/toolchain/rules.bzl:24:33: in <toplevel>
ERROR: An error occurred during the fetch of repository 'llvm_toolchain':
   Traceback (most recent call last):
        File "/home/mattia/.cache/bazel/_bazel_mattia/d3471c3b3fa4133093f049a701cbc11f/external/com_grail_bazel_toolchain/toolchain/internal/configure.bzl", line 110, column 37, in llvm_toolchain_impl
                _download_llvm_preconfigured(rctx)
        File "/home/mattia/.cache/bazel/_bazel_mattia/d3471c3b3fa4133093f049a701cbc11f/external/com_grail_bazel_toolchain/toolchain/internal/llvm_distributions.bzl", line 177, column 13, in download_llvm_preconfigured
                fail("Unknown LLVM release: %s\nPlease ensure file name is correct." % basename)
Error in fail: Unknown LLVM release: clang+llvm-10.0.0-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-16.04.tar.xz
Please ensure file name is correct.
ERROR: Error fetching repository: Traceback (most recent call last):
        File "/home/mattia/.cache/bazel/_bazel_mattia/d3471c3b3fa4133093f049a701cbc11f/external/com_grail_bazel_toolchain/toolchain/internal/configure.bzl", line 110, column 37, in llvm_toolchain_impl
                _download_llvm_preconfigured(rctx)
        File "/home/mattia/.cache/bazel/_bazel_mattia/d3471c3b3fa4133093f049a701cbc11f/external/com_grail_bazel_toolchain/toolchain/internal/llvm_distributions.bzl", line 177, column 13, in download_llvm_preconfigured
                fail("Unknown LLVM release: %s\nPlease ensure file name is correct." % basename)
Error in fail: Unknown LLVM release: clang+llvm-10.0.0-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-16.04.tar.xz
Please ensure file name is correct.
ERROR: no such package '@llvm_toolchain//': Unknown LLVM release: clang+llvm-10.0.0-x86_64-linux-gnu-ubuntu-16.04.tar.xz
Please ensure file name is correct.
INFO: Elapsed time: 0.215s
INFO: 0 processes.
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (0 packages loaded)
FAILED: Build did NOT complete successfully (0 packages loaded)
```

Any help appreciated I can try to move this forward.
